snippet.title: PORADORA vs Monsters of the World - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
PORADORA vs Monsters of the World is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer where you travel across the coolest places on earth to defeat all the monsters and find all the mythological secret there! Now let's jump, shoot, slide, and defeat all the monsters! LET'S GO!

Music : Fablefly
Wishlist the game on steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3328010/PORADORA_vs_Monsters_of_the_World
